PageTitle: Download Community versions of ONLYOFFICE products | ONLYOFFICE
DownloadCommunityVersions: Download Community versions of ONLYOFFICE products
OODocsCommunityText: Get the community version of ONLYOFFICE Docs to install, configure, and maintain the solution on your own.
OODocsCommunityBanner: Need more concurrent connections, mobile web editors, or professional technical assistance from the ONLYOFFICE team? Opt for <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs Enterprise</0>. Want to bring ONLYOFFICE Docs to your customers under your brand? Choose <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Developer</1>.
ForWindowsServer2012OrHigher: For Windows Server 2016 or higher (64-bit only)
GetTheLatestVersionOfOwnCloud: Get the latest version of ownCloud with ONLYOFFICE Docs pre-installed.
GetTheLatestVersionOfNextcloud: Get the latest version of Nextcloud with ONLYOFFICE editors pre-installed.
OODocSpaceCommunityText: Get the community version of DocSpace to install, configure, and maintain the solution on their own.
OODocSpaceCommunityBanner: Need more concurrent connections, mobile web editors, or professional technical assistance from the ONLYOFFICE team? Opt for <0>ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Enterprise</0>. Want to bring ONLYOFFICE DocSpace to your customers under your brand? Choose <0>ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Developer</0>.
